snippet.title: Colonies Neociv (12/17/2011)
snippet.description:
Official description: Neociv is a perfect world were people only work on their passions. But something is not right and you are scrambling for your life and the future of Neociv in this story-driven adventure game.

RELEASE DATE: 12/17/2011
DEVELOPER: Twist-EdGames.com
GENRE: Action & Adventure
Offline players 1
